#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,p;
        cin>>n>>p;
        int a[n],i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        int c=0;
        i=0;
        while(i<n&&a[i]>=p)
        {
            c++;
            i++;
        }
        cout<<c<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
